1.text: Impressive! You two are \na simply wonderful pairing…!!

2.text: Excellent! I look forward \nto seeing more!

3.text: Superb! It looks like you're \ngradually gaining strength!

4.text: Bravo! I will be looking forward \nto your future growth!

5.text: Your growth… that radiant sparkle \nin your eyes… Haaaa! So～! Good～!!

6.text: This horsegirl and her trainer certainly \nhave joined the racing world!

7.text: It's about time I wrote \na special feature…!

8.text: I'm expecting even more to come!

9.text: To think you'd get this far… I must ascertain \njust where you will end up myself.

10.text: You're not all talk, I see.

11.text: Please keep earnestly facing forwards \nwith your horsegirl, as a trainer.

12.text: I hope to see something worthy of \nTracen Academy's name from you.

13.text: Every time I come to observe \nlately I find myself captivated \nby the glow surrounding you.

14.text: You've polished yourselves even further…! \nRemarkable as always, Trainer.

15.text: It looks like your daily work \nis really paying off!

16.text: If I can help with anything \nplease let me know!

21.text: You can be proud. …I mean that! \nThe two of you — that's what \ndreams are made of.

22.text: Sharing the joys and tears together… \nYou really are perfect for one another!

23.text: It looks like you two have a good relationship. \nVery good, that's what I like to see!

24.text: Is all going well? Don't hesitate to \nask if anything is troubling you!
